summary: ENB based on the Kountervibe with a complete GUI and dedicated for screenarchery.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#ff0000][size=4][b][/b][/size][/color][/center][center][color=#ff0000][size=4][b][img]http://i.imgur.com/S3sqhnG.jpg[/img]

Description[/b][/size][/color]
In the first place, this was a semi-private ENB that we decided to share because we received several requests to do so.
Nonetheless, having a busy schedule by now, we might not be able to provide a real support.

Rampage is an ENB based on the[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?] Kountervibe[/url], one of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3463021/?]Kyokushinoyama[/url]'s presets. Its main interests lie in the integration of new shaders and of a
comprehensive GUI, easy to use and accessible to everyone in which you'll be able to access several new settings and effects, while keeping an accurate control over each of these features.
DoF unpleases you ? No worries ! You can adjust the whole thing to your best convenience. And that's only a start, the list of available features is really large. It is a flexible ENB, built in the first place for tweakers and screenarchery, a "photoshop-like" ENB.

To those who might not want to spend time in settings and who wish no more than just playing, performances are close to the Kountervibe "performance" preset while retaining a close visual.

[youtube]AIVktlRH_tM[/youtube] [youtube]YGknHASE7gA[/youtube]
[youtube]APARiHca-mM[/youtube] [youtube]TbnJOhwwjSU[/youtube]

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b]Installation and tips
[/b][/size][/color]________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#ffff00][color=#ffffff]Download Rampage archive and extract the contents of the "ENB" folder in your root Skyrim directory (the one where you'll find the TESV.exe file), by default in "C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\SteamApps\common\Skyrim.
[/color][/color][b][color=#ffff00]
Wrapper installation[/color][/b]
Download the latest ENBSeries build from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]enbdev.com[/url] and copy d3d9.dll and enbhost.exe from the wrapper folder to your skyrim folder.

[b][color=#ffff00]OR[/color][/b]
[b][color=#ffff00]Injector installation[/color][/b]
Download the latest ENBSeries build from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]enbdev.com[/url] and copy enbseries.dll, enbhost.exe, ENBinjector.exe and enbinjector.ini from the injector folder to your skyrim folder.
Rename d3d9_SMAA.dll extracted from the Rampage archive to d3d9.dll.
Open enbinjector.ini and configure your [TARGETPROCESS] like this :

[TARGETPROCESS]
ProcessName0=skse_loader.exe
ProcessName1=SkyrimLauncher.exe
ProcessName2=TESV.exe

Now open enblocal.ini and replace "ProxyLibrary=d3d9_smaa.dll" by "ProxyLibrary=d3d9.dll"
Please note you'll need to run ENBinjector.exe before you start your game.
________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Now open the enbsunsprite.fx file (not the ini) in your enbseries folder with any text editor and find these lines :
#elif (USE_DOWNSAMPLING == 1)
#define fWidth 2560.0
#define fHeight 1440.0
Change these values to your desired resolution and save.

Example for 1920x1080 :
#elif (USE_DOWNSAMPLING == 1)
#define fWidth 1920.0
#define fHeight 1080.0

[color=#ffff00]If you can't find this file, set your OS to show file extensions.[/color]
 
Open your "SkyrimPrefs.ini" file located by default in "C:\Users\[Username]\Documents\My Games\Skyrim".
Find the [Display] section and modify or add the following lines :
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

Steam overlay can cause some render issues.
If it happens, open "injector.ini" file in your skyrim directory and changes "weird_steam_hack = 0" to "weird_steam_hack = 1"
 
Don't forget to disable Anti-aliasing and Anisotropic Filtering in the Skyrim Launcher and in your Nvidia/AMD driver settings.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/4CDpd9p.jpg[/img]

[color=#ffff00][b]Shift + Enter to open the GUI and start tweaking \o/
Print screen to save a bmp screenshot in your Skyrim folder[/b][/color]

 [color=#ff0000][size=4]Highly Recommended Mods
[/size][/color][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27960/?]Blackout - Simply Darker Dungeons[/url] OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12454/?]Further Dark Dungeons[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9930/?]
Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]Realistic Sun and Sunglare - Vanilla Edition v2[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58338/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D58338&pUp=1]Kyo's Skybox Clouds/Stars/Moons Textures and Meshes (check the optional files)[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16541/?]Real Rain Basic[/url]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/t4xgftE.jpg[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Credits[/size][/color]
Boris Vorontsov - ENB Series
CeeJay.dk - SweetFX Shader Suite
Kyokushinoyama - Kountervibe author, enbseries.ini enbbloom.fx & enbsunsprite.fx
Myloween - Help and participation in the project
ericking1992 - Help and support, LUT code, DoF, additional ALF
Prod80 - Help, enbeffect.fx effects, bloom shaders
HeliosDoubleSix - HD6 code
gp65cj04 - Bokeh DoF & Tilt Shift
OtisInf - DoF desaturation shaders
Insomnia - lens.fx
Jawz - ENB Resources
Mindflux - Optionals Files
Matso, Zeroking, MTichenor, Miratheus

[color=#ff0000][size=4]Permissions[/size][/color]
I don't give any permissions for reuploading because some files use code segments that are not originally mine.
Contact me for any questions.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/0eI1z4t.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Kobalk and Myloween

files.name: Rampage ENB 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Version 2.0 (09/02/2015) :
- Add LUT support and 7 presets

Version 1.7 (02/02/2016) :
- Updated bloom file with Bilinear Filtering Code, Sampling Methods and grain
- Added SFX sharpen with depth control (enbeffect.txt)
- Removed old CoT IDs from weatherFX

Version 1.6 (25/07/2015) :
- New "Crazy Flare" enblens.fx from kingeric, featuring ALF, chromatic aberration, starburst & modular flares with full GUI controls
- Various tweaks to reflection, enbeffect.fx.ini & enbsunsprite.fx.ini
- Added optional files with WeatherFX support (raindrop & frost mask) for vanilla game and old versions of cot

Version 1.5 (18/07/2015) :
- SweetFX dependency removed. No more problems with ENBSeries injector and maybe slightly better performance
- Tweaks to enbeffect.fx.ini, enbeffect.txt.ini (contrast, brightness, postprocess, vibrance, lumasharpen)
- Tweaks to enbsunsprite.fx.ini, dynamics sun rays should be visible now
- Tweaks to the sky, mist, environment and procedural Sun

Version 1.4 (07/05/2015) :
- Updated DoF and sunsprite files, better performance and more GUI options
- Minors tweaks to lens

Version 1.3 (05/02/2015) :
- GUI reorganization for better use and clarity
Shaders and GUI additions :
- Added clip mode to see pure white & black on the screen
- Added palette mixer which control intensity of the palette
- Added ENB PP method options
- New code and optimization for RGB and black levels
- New code and options for the grain

Version 1.2 (31/01/2015) :
- Reflection activation and tweaks
- New options in enbeffect.txt

Version 1.1 (28/01/2015) :
- Tweaks & fixes on nights.

Version 1.01 (25/01/2015) :
- Tweaks to environment, IBL, mist, AFX & technicolor

Version 1.0 (25/01/2015) :
- Tweaks to environment, skylightning, imaged based lightning, AFX & technicolor
- Unlocked some options and added HD6 control parameters in the GUI (brightness, contrast, saturation)
- Added on/off buttons for some effects

Beta 1 (15/01/2015) :

- First public test release
Includes all custom shaders. To bring up the ingame GUI, press Shift + Enter
Modifications :
- Deleted weatherlist (not used in Rampage ENB)
- Original DoF (enbeffectprepass.fx) replaced by Kingeric1992's modified version of gp65cj04's file, tweaked by ourselves
- Original lens file (enblens.fx) replaced by Insomnia and Kingeric1992's file with complete GUI, tweaked by ourselves
- Change of the enblensmask.png file
- Recoding and tweaks to the enbsunsprite.fx file to add additional GUI settings :
* Lens, corona and peak settings
- Recoding to the enbbloom.fx file to add additional GUI settings :
* Anamorphic flare, bloom radius, bloom exposure, bloom multiplier, bloom spray and bloom contrast settings
- Original enbeffect.txt file replaced, replaced vibrance shader (already have some) by a "painting" style shader with GUI controllable paint radius
- Rewrote enbeffect.fx from Kountervibe's file. Added GUI settings and the following shaders :
* HD6 settings (RGB balance , color saturation, bloom kolorizator)
* Level controls (gamma, black & white levels)
* After Effects (contrast, luminosity, vibrance, RGB saturation)
* Tonemapping
* Color tinting (Selective desaturation), black and white filter
* HSL = tint, saturation, luminance
* Technicolor and color tint
- Tweaks to water, underwater, environment, procedural sun and sunrays settings
